welcome.description: Are you aiming to elevate your portfolio and secure a spot at your dream university? At Student.com, we offer a comprehensive suite of courses and events designed to enhance your academic profile and make your application stand out.

FAQ.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.q1: What is the purpose of the Darwin.kz website?
FAQ.a1: The Darwin platform provides school students and university students with the opportunity to explore various subjects through courses offered by the community and to develop extracurricular activities.
FAQ.a2: Курсы на Student.com строятся с использованием инструментов и сервисов, таких как Coursera, Udemy, и LinkedIn Learning. Вы можете создать свой курс, добавляя видео, текстовые упражнения, игры, и делиться его с сообществом.
